allocation.quarry_level: Physical allocation based on weight or economic allocation based on internal cost system
allocation.batching_plant_level: Physical allocation based on m³ of concrete

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to and from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered via trucks and ships without packaging

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good or very good for all data sources
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: Data updated within 10 years as required

system_boundaries.upstream_processes: Extraction, transport and manufacturing of raw materials; generation of electricity for modules A1 and A3
system_boundaries.core_processes: External transportation of materials, manufacturing of concrete (excluding mixing in truck), treatment of waste and wastewater
system_boundaries.downstream_processes: Distribution, installation, wastage, transport and treatment of waste at end of life

installation.operational_control: Holcim does not have operational control over installation
installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities_included: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities

end_of_life.control: Holcim has no control over end-of-life fate

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

benefits_module_D.description: Environmental benefits from reuse, recovery, and recycling of deconstructed concrete
benefits_module_D.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials needs to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials need to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process where concrete absorbs CO2 from atmosphere during use stage onward
carbonation.note: CO2 absorption not considered in this EPD and not reflected in results

sustainability_commitment.net_zero_targets: Industry's first 2050 net-zero targets endorsed by Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi)

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
